metadata.title: CVE-2022-43242 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Libde265 v1.0.8 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflowvulnerability via mc_luma<unsigned char> in motion.cc. This vulnerabilityallows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted videofile.

criterions.comment: libde265 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
